name: thoughtful-dev
description: Transforms Claude Code from a fast coder into a thoughtful development partner. Includes requirements clarification, implementation planning, breakthrough generation, and comprehensive documentation standards.

skills.name: requirements-clarifier
skills.description: Prevents premature implementation by ensuring genuine understanding of requirements. Activates when user requests new features or changes with ambiguous requirements. Asks clarifying questions, validates assumptions, and gets explicit agreement before any coding begins.

skills.name: implementation-planner
skills.description: Creates thought-through implementation plans before coding. Analyzes current state, proposes approaches with trade-offs, breaks down work, identifies risks, and gets user agreement. Prevents premature coding and ensures alignment on technical decisions.

skills.name: breakthrough-generator
skills.description: Systematic techniques for generating breakthroughs when conventional problem-solving approaches have failed. Use this skill when stuck on difficult problems where obvious solutions have been tried and haven't worked, when facing impossible constraints, when analysis paralysis has set in, or when creative thinking is needed to find novel solutions.

features: Git workflow safety (always branches, never main)
